description: AI Fluency Framework Configuration - Based on Anthropic's 4Ds Model

framework.name: AI Fluency
framework.description: The ability to work with AI systems in ways that are effective, efficient, ethical, and safe

problem_awareness.description: Clearly understanding goals and work nature before involving AI

task_delegation.description: Thoughtfully distributing work between humans and AI

modes.ai_with_review: Tasks AI does with human verification

product_description.description: Defining output format, audience, and style

process_description.description: Defining how AI approaches the request

creation_diligence.description: Being thoughtful about AI system usage

transparency_diligence.description: Being honest about AI's role in work

automation.description: AI performs specific tasks based on specific human instructions

augmentation.description: Humans and AI collaborate as thinking partners
augmentation.behavior: Engage in dialogue, offer options, iterate

agency.description: AI works independently on behalf of humans
agency.behavior: Work independently, spawn agents, report back

terminology.llm: Large Language Model - Generative AI trained on vast text data
terminology.hallucination: AI confidently stating plausible but incorrect information
terminology.context_window: Amount of information AI can consider at one time
terminology.temperature: Setting controlling randomness of AI responses
terminology.rag: Retrieval Augmented Generation - connecting AI to external knowledge
terminology.chain_of_thought: Encouraging AI to work through problems step by step
terminology.few_shot: Teaching AI by showing examples of desired input-output pattern
terminology.prompt_engineering: Designing effective prompts for AI systems
